mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phone_verification ( event_id, status, sent_at, expires_at ) VALUES ( #{eventId}, #{status}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) )
mapper.update: UPDATE phone_verification SET status = #{status}, verified_at = CASE WHEN #{status} = 'VERIFIED' THEN NOW() ELSE verified_at END WHERE verification_id = #{verificationId}
